name: io.github.cyanheads/obsidian-mcp-server
description: MCP server for interacting with Obsidian vaults via Local REST API. Provides note operations, search, periodic notes, and command execution.

environmentVariables.name: OBSIDIAN_API_URL
environmentVariables.description: Base URL for Obsidian Local REST API (default: https://127.0.0.1:27124).

environmentVariables.name: OBSIDIAN_API_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: API token generated from Obsidian Local REST API plugin settings.

environmentVariables.name: OBSIDIAN_CERT_VALIDATION
environmentVariables.description: Enable certificate validation for HTTPS (set to 'false' for self-signed certs).

environmentVariables.name: MCP_LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Sets the minimum log level for output (e.g., 'debug', 'info', 'warn').
